#zenhare would like to point out that if #BoJo objects to the idea of #strike action by teachers on #MARCH8th he should have given them #keyworker status and the bloody #vaccine.
The hedgerow is still in #lockdown!  #ReopenSchools #mondaythoughts #bbcnews #education #COVID19 https://t.co/hVPQtrrm3p
